version_description:
Improved login access and configuration.
Improved pagination load on query grid view.

Improved login access and configuration.
Improved pagination load on query grid view.

New customization of page size query result.
New customization of SQL syntax colors.
Fixed execution of query with comments.

New customization of page size query result.
New customization of SQL syntax colors.
Fixed execution of query with comments.

New customization of page size query result.
New customization of SQL syntax colors.
Fixed execution of query with comments.

New customization of page size query result.
New customization of SQL syntax colors.
Fixed execution of query with comments.

- New Dark Theme
- Connection protected with Touch ID / Face ID
- Data Grid Zoom
- Data Grid Columns Resize
- Improved Error Messages
- Quick Query Execution from Query List

- New Dark Theme
- Connection protected with Touch ID / Face ID
- Data Grid Zoom
- Data Grid Columns Resize
- Improved Error Messages
- Quick Query Execution from Query List

New Server Status Graphs.
New Excel export format.
New support for iCloud Keychain.
Load BLOB fields.
Quick sort and filter on column header.

New Server Status Graphs.
New Excel export format.
New support for iCloud Keychain.
Load BLOB fields.
Quick sort and filter on column header.

Browsing of DB structure within a query or a record editor.
"Pinning" table grid view for later viewing.

Browsing of DB structure within a query or a record editor.
"Pinning" table grid view for later viewing.
Fixed a crash on iPad.
Fixed a crash on iPad.
New Import of CSV and MSAccess(MDB/ACCDB) tables
New Import of CSV and MSAccess(MDB/ACCDB) tables
Support for iOS 13.
Support for iOS 13.
Improved grid search and bug fix.
Improved grid search and bug fix.
• Fix list of tables under compatibility level 100 (SQL Server 2008)
• Fix list of tables under compatibility level 100 (SQL Server 2008)

• New SQL completion assistant.
• Organize queries by hashtag (with a #tag in query's comment).
• New named parameters in SQL query and autosave of params value.
• More bug fix.
